artist: Artist: Katsushika Hokusai; Author: Poem by Shibanoya San'yō; Author: Poem by San'ōsha Mitsuhiko
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
Right, by San\'ōsha Mitsuhiko: Taoyame no ??? kaze sae tōru sode no ume??  
Left, by Shibanoya San\'yō: Uchiataru mami mo ? ma aru shiohigata ???? tama-sudare-gai
medium: Woodblock print (surimono); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Shells Pairing by Immortal Poets in the Genroku Style (Genroku kasen kai awase 元禄歌仙貝合)
title: The Bamboo-Blind Shell
